channel.title: Ukraine on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections
channel.description: Recent content in Ukraine on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections

item.title: Current situation and control strategies for the resurgence of diphtheria in newly independent states of the former Soviet Union
item.description: Vaccination coverage in Ukraine is above 90% among children, and over half of adults have been vaccinated between 1991 and 1994. Nonetheless, the number of diphtheria cases is increasing.
